def reverser(sentence):
    return ' '.join(i[::-1] for i in sentence.split(' '))

def reverser(s):
    return " ".join(w[::-1] for w in s.split(" "))

def reverser(sentence):
    newsent = sentence.split(" ")
    rnsent = [i[::-1] for i in newsent]
    s = " "
    s = s.join(rnsent)
    return s
reverser = lambda x: ' '.join([i[::-1] for i in x.split(' ')])
